data.name: DocumentationGenerateToken
data.value: Performs the user authentication process using the provided credentials.

data.name: DocumentationGetAccounts
data.value: Retrieves all user accounts in the system.

data.name: DocumentationGetAccountById
data.value: Retrieves a specific user account by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationAddAccount
data.value: Performs the account creation process using the provided user information.

data.name: DocumentationUpdateAccount
data.value: Updates an existing user account with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationDeleteAccount
data.value: Removes a user account from the system by its unique identifier.

data.name: APIManagement
data.value: API for user authentication and account management.

data.name: DocumentationGetActions
data.value: Retrieves all available actions in the system.

data.name: DocumentationGetActionById
data.value: Retrieves a specific action by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationAddAction
data.value: Creates a new action with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationUpdateAction
data.value: Updates an existing action with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationDeleteAction
data.value: Removes an action from the system by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationGetClaims
data.value: Retrieves all available claims in the system.

data.name: DocumentationGetClaimById
data.value: Retrieves a specific claim by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationAddClaim
data.value: Creates a new claim with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationUpdateClaim
data.value: Updates an existing claim with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationDeleteClaim
data.value: Removes a claim from the system by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationGetClaimActions
data.value: Retrieves all available claim actions in the system.

data.name: DocumentationGetClaimActionById
data.value: Retrieves a specific claim action by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationAddClaimAction
data.value: Creates a new claim action with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationUpdateClaimAction
data.value: Updates an existing claim action with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationDeleteClaimAction
data.value: Removes a claim action from the system by its unique identifier.

data.name: DocumentationGetAccountClaimActions
data.value: Retrieves account claim actions, optionally filtered by account ID or claim action ID.

data.name: GetAccountClaimActionById
data.value: Get account claim action by IDs

data.name: DocumentationGetAccountClaimActionById
data.value: Retrieves a specific account claim action by account ID and claim action ID.

data.name: DocumentationAddAccountClaimAction
data.value: Creates a new account claim action association with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationUpdateAccountClaimAction
data.value: Updates an existing account claim action association with the provided information.

data.name: DocumentationDeleteAccountClaimAction
data.value: Removes an account claim action association from the system.

data.name: OneOrMoreValidationErrorsOccurred
data.value: One or more validation errors occurred.

data.name: TheRequestedResourceWasNotFound
data.value: The requested resource was not found.

data.name: RequestConflictsWithCurrentState
data.value: The request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

data.name: ActionControllerDescription
data.value: Controller responsible for managing actions in the system. Provides CRUD operations for actions that can be combined with claims to form permissions. Actions define what operations can be performed on resources in the RBAC system.

data.name: AccountControllerDescription
data.value: Controller responsible for managing user accounts in the system. Provides CRUD operations for user accounts, including account creation, retrieval, updates, and deletion. Handles account management operations with proper authentication and authorization controls.

data.name: AccountClaimActionControllerDescription
data.value: Controller responsible for managing account-claim-action associations in the RBAC system. Provides CRUD operations for linking user accounts with specific claim-action permissions. Enables fine-grained access control by assigning specific permissions to individual accounts.

data.name: ClaimActionControllerDescription
data.value: Controller responsible for managing claim-action associations in the RBAC system. Provides CRUD operations for linking claims with actions to create specific permissions. Claim-actions define what operations (actions) can be performed on specific resources (claims).

data.name: ClaimControllerDescription
data.value: Controller for managing claims in the Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system. Provides CRUD operations for claims (permissions/roles) that can be assigned to users. Claims are fundamental building blocks for the authorization system.

data.name: AuthenticationControllerDescription
data.value: Controller responsible for handling authentication operations. Provides endpoints for JWT token generation and user authentication.

data.name: ReturnsListOfAllUserAccountsInTheSystem
data.value: List of all user accounts in the system

data.name: ReturnsListOfAllActionsInTheSystem
data.value: List of all actions in the system

data.name: ReturnsListOfAllClaimActionsInTheSystem
data.value: List of all claim actions in the system

data.name: ReturnsClaimActionMatchingTheSpecifiedID
data.value: Claim action matching the specified ID

data.name: ReturnsListOfAccountClaimActionsMatchingTheSpecifiedFilters
data.value: List of account claim actions matching the specified filters

data.name: ReturnsAccountClaimActionMatchingTheSpecifiedAccountAndClaimActionIDs
data.value: Account claim action matching the specified account and claim action IDs

data.name: ReturnsJWTTokenWithUserInformationOnSuccessValidationErrorsUnauthorizedAccessOrInternalServerError
data.value: Returns a JWT token with user information on success (200), validation errors (400), unauthorized access (401), or internal server error (500)

data.name: ReturnsListOfClaimObjectsWithTheirTypesValuesAndDescriptionsOnSuccessValidationErrorsUnauthorizedAccessOrInternalServerError
data.value: List of claim objects with their types, values, and descriptions on success (200), validation errors (400), unauthorized access (401), or internal server error (500)

data.name: ResponseInvalidRequestDataOrValidationErrors
data.value: Invalid request data or validation errors

data.name: ResponseUnauthorizedAccessValidJWTTokenRequired
data.value: Unauthorized access - valid JWT token required
